appDesc.message: Copies to clipboard BibTeX reference to book from Google's bookstore. Also works for any another website.

config_use_url_title.message: Add bookstore's URL to BibTeX items

config_use_url_desc.message: Enable this option to include URL of bookstore into bibliography

config_urldate_format_desc.message: Use %DD%, %MM%, %YYYY% placeholders to define urldate format

config_default_language_desc.message: Language that will be set for BibTeX entries by default
